scripts.updateBulidCode: npm run updateCode & npm run bulidCode
scripts.docker:all: docker-compose stop redis mysql server client-nginx admin-nginx  & docker-compose rm -f redis mysql server client-nginx admin-nginx & docker rmi  ot-system-redis  ot-system-mysql  ot-system-server  ot-system-client-nginx  ot-system-admin-nginx & docker-compose build & docker-compose up -d
scripts.publish:all: npm run updateBulidCode & npm run docker:all
scripts.publish:redis: docker-compose stop redis & docker-compose rm -f redis & docker rmi ot-system-redis & docker-compose build redis & docker-compose up -d redis
scripts.publish:mysql: docker-compose stop mysql & docker-compose rm -f mysql & docker rmi ot-system-mysql &  docker-compose build mysql & docker-compose up -d mysql
scripts.publish:server: docker-compose stop server & docker-compose rm -f server & docker rmi ot-system-server & docker-compose build server & docker-compose up -d server
scripts.publish:client-nginx: cross-env publish=client-nginx  npm run updateCode & cross-env publish=client-nginx npm run bulidCode & docker-compose stop client-nginx & docker-compose rm -f client-nginx & docker rmi ot-system-client-nginx & docker-compose build client-nginx & docker-compose up -d client-nginx
scripts.publish:admin-nginx: cross-env publish=admin-nginx  npm run updateCode & cross-env publish=admin-nginx npm run bulidCode & docker-compose stop admin-nginx & docker-compose rm -f admin-nginx & docker rmi ot-system-admin-nginx & docker-compose build admin-nginx & docker-compose up -d admin-nginx
scripts.publish:entry-nginx: docker-compose stop entry-nginx & docker-compose rm -f entry-nginx & docker rmi ot-system-entry-nginx & docker-compose build entry-nginx & docker-compose up -d entry-nginx
